snippet.title: What The Bat? Battywood Update - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase
snippet.description: What The Bat? gets new levels as you travel to Battywood in this new update for the slapstick VR comedy game from the creators of What The Golf? and What The Car? Watch the trailer to see what to expect with the What The Bat?: Battywood update, available now on Meta Quest. In What The Bat?, you have bats for hands - now GO! Swing through a series of increasingly silly minigames in a slapstick VR comedy that’s about so much more than baseball.
